document.full_text: pimco's bill gross, the manager of the world's largest bond fund, raised his bet against u.s. government-related debt in april to 4 percent from 3 percent, according to the company's website on monday.
document.title: pimco raises bet against u.s. government debt
lines_and_colors: pimco's bill gross, the manager of the world's largest bond fund, raised his bet against u.s. government-related debt in april to 4 percent from 3 percent, according to the company's website on monday.
